author: RTÉ News
title: Trump recommends face covering to stop virus
description: US President Donald Trump has announced new government recommendations for all Americans to wear masks when they go outside to help to stop the spread of the Covid-19.
content:
US President Donald Trump has announced new government recommendations for all Americans to wear masks when they go outside to help to stop the spread of the Covid-19.
Mr Trump told a White House press conference that the Centers for Disease Control and Prev… [+927 chars]
